price: Andolsun ki biz onlara –belki dönerler diye- en büyük azaptan önce yakın azaptan mutlaka tattıracağız.
arabic: وَلَنُذِيقَنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَدۡنَىٰ دُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: walanudhīqannahum mina al-ʿadhābi al-adnā dūna al-ʿadhābi al-akbari laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
translations: And surely, We will let them taste
